author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...JOYCE WEAKENS TO A DEPRESSION... ...EXPECTED TO BECOME A POST-TROPICAL REMNANT LOW ON MONDAY...
summary:
...JOYCE WEAKENS TO A DEPRESSION... ...EXPECTED TO BECOME A POST-TROPICAL REMNANT LOW ON MONDAY...
 As of 11:00 PM AST Sun Sep 29
 the center of Joyce was located near 22.3, -49.6
 with movement NW at 6 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.
